MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the WA9 postcode area of St Helens, affecting properties in Wood Street, Hollybank Grove  and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 2:22PM. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of extensive repairs required. Our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 02:15AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:25PM on 24th January 2021.
